ingredients.content: 125 g sunflower seeds, soaked in water for 2-4 hours, then drained
50 g celery stalks, cut in pieces
2 red peppers, sliced in half and deseeded
2 yellow peppers, sliced in half and deseeded

preparations.content: Place soaked and drained sunflower seeds, carrots, celery, onion, tahini, lemon juice, dill and tamari in mixing bowl then chop <b>10 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula then chop again <b>10 sec/speed 5<b>.
Fill each pepper half with some of the seed mixture and serve immediately.
